com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Interface SmcImageViewer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SmcDevice

    public interface SmcImageViewer
extends SmcDevice
    This interface provides methods to display images and control the image viewer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SmcImageViewer.EventListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for image viewer events.
      static interface  SmcImageViewer.ResponseListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for response events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_BUFFERING
      Image viewer is buffering content.
      static int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_CONTENT_CHANGED
      Image viewer content has changed.
      static int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_HIDDEN
      Image viewer is stopped.
      static int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_SHOWING
      Image viewer is displaying content.
      static int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_UNKNOWN
      Unknown state.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol.SmcDevice

        DOMAIN_LOCAL_NETWORK, DOMAIN_MY_DEVICE, DOMAIN_REMOTE_NETWORK, DOMAIN_UNKNOWN, TYPE_AVPLAYER, TYPE_IMAGEVIEWER, TYPE_PROVIDER, TYPE_UNKNOWN

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Field Detail

      • IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_HIDDEN

        static final int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_HIDDEN
        Image viewer is stopped.

        You can indicate that the image viewer has stopped in your application. You can invoke the show() method in this state.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_BUFFERING

        static final int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_BUFFERING
        Image viewer is buffering content.

        You can indicate that the image viewer is loading content in your application. You cannot invoke the show() or hide() methods in this state.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_SHOWING

        static final int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_SHOWING
        Image viewer is displaying content.

        You can indicate that the image viewing is showing content in your application. You can invoke the hide() method in this state.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_CONTENT_CHANGED

        static final int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_CONTENT_CHANGED
        Image viewer content has changed.

        The image viewer has received other content and your content is no longer visible. Reinitialize your content by calling the show(SmcItem) method again to play your original content.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_UNKNOWN

        static final int IMAGE_VIEWER_STATE_UNKNOWN
        Unknown state.

        You can ignore this state for the image viewer GUI.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • show

        void show(SmcItem smcItem)
        Show the specified image content. The response for this method is returned asynchronously using SmcImageViewer.ResponseListener.onShow(SmcImageViewer, SmcItem, int).
        Parameters:
        smcItem - The image contents that you want to show.

      • prepare

        void prepare(SmcItem smcItem)
        Prepare the image viewer to show the specified image contents by pre-fetching the content while other image content is showing.
        Parameters:
        smcItem - The image that you want to show.

      • hide

        void hide()
        Hide the image viewer.

        This removes the image viewer from the screen.

        The response for this method is returned asynchronously using SmcImageViewer.ResponseListener.onHide(SmcImageViewer, int).

      • requestStateInfo

        void requestStateInfo()
        Get the image viewer state.

        The response for this method is returned asynchronously using SmcImageViewer.ResponseListener.onRequestStateInfo(SmcImageViewer, int, int).

      • isSupportRedirect

        boolean isSupportRedirect()
        Check if the image viewer supports the redirect delivery mode.

        For more information, see Field Detail in the SmcItem.WebContent class reference.

        Returns:
        • true - if the image viewer supports redirect delivery.
        • false - if the image viewer does not support redirect delivery.

      • setResponseListener

        void setResponseListener(SmcImageViewer.ResponseListener listener)
        Set the specified ResponseListener instance to receive response events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The ResponseListener instance for receiving response callback events. Set to null to unregister the current listener.

      • setEventListener

        void setEventListener(SmcImageViewer.EventListener listener)
        Set the specified EventListener instance to receive image viewer events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The EventListener instance for receiving image viewer callback events. Set to null to unregister the current listener.
